Sets the number of bands, refresh internal, and the type of algorithm to use for the spectrum movement.
setupText() - Static method in class application.UI.DisplayText
Sets the text and font for the volume HUD, pause HUD, GitHub link, artist, and title text.
showUpdatePrompt() - Static method in class application.UI.Updater
Displays the prompt window if there's an update available.

Skips the current track.
